name: ia-insight-portal
description: Portal profissional da IA Insight - Especialistas em agentes de IA personalizados

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:copy && npm run build:optimize
scripts.build:copy: cp -r assets dist/ && cp -r components dist/ && cp -r pages dist/ && cp *.html dist/ && cp robots.txt dist/ && cp sitemap.xml dist/ && cp sw.js dist/ && cp assets/site.webmanifest dist/
scripts.build:optimize: npm run optimize:paths && npm run optimize:images && npm run create:nojekyll
scripts.optimize:paths: find dist -name '*.html' -exec sed -i 's|href="/|href="./|g' {} \; && find dist -name '*.html' -exec sed -i 's|src="/|src="./|g' {} \;
scripts.build:github-pages: npm run build && echo 'CNAME' > dist/CNAME && echo 'iainsight.com.br' >> dist/CNAME
scripts.analyze: npm run build && npx lighthouse dist/index.html --output=html --output-path=./lighthouse-report.html

author: IA Insight
